mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX, A.board_ID, A.BOARD_NM, A.BOARD_DESC, A.BOARD_TYPE, A.USE_YN, IFNULL(C.USER_NICKNM,'탈퇴된 관리자')AS CREATE_NICKNM, A.CREATE_IDX, A.CREATE_DATE, IF( A.UPDATE_IDX IS NULL , NULL, IFNULL(D.USER_NICKNM,'탈퇴된 관리자')) AS UPDATE_NICKNM, A.UPDATE_IDX, A.UPDATE_DATE, IFNULL(B.CNT,'0') AS CNT FROM board_master A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(A.IDX) AS CNT, MASTER_IDX FROM board A LEFT JOIN board_master B ON A.MASTER_IDX = B.IDX WHERE A.MASTER_IDX = B.IDX GROUP BY MASTER_IDX ) B ON A.IDX = B.MASTER_IDX LEFT JOIN users C ON A.CREATE_IDX = C.IDX LEFT JOIN users D ON A.UPDATE_IDX = D.IDX WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_master ( BOARD_ID, BOARD_NM, BOARD_DESC, BOARD_TYPE, LIST_LEVEL, READ_LEVEL, WRITE_LEVEL, COMMENT_LEVEL, UPLOAD_LEVEL, EDITOR_LEVEL, USE_YN, CREATE_IDX, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{boardId}, #{boardNm}, #{boardDesc}, #{boardType}, #{listLevel}, #{readLevel}, #{writeLevel}, #{commentLevel}, #{uploadLevel}, #{editorLevel}, #{useYn}, #{userIdx}, date_format(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') )
mapper.update: UPDATE board_master SET BOARD_ID= #{boardId}, BOARD_NM= #{boardNm}, BOARD_DESC= #{boardDesc}, BOARD_TYPE=#{boardType}, LIST_LEVEL = #{listLevel}, READ_LEVEL = #{readLevel}, WRITE_LEVEL = #{writeLevel}, COMMENT_LEVEL = #{commentLevel}, UPLOAD_LEVEL = #{uploadLevel}, EDITOR_LEVEL = #{editorLevel}, USE_YN=#{useYn}, UPDATE_IDX= #{userIdx}, UPDATE_DATE= SYSDATE() WHERE IDX= #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX, A.board_ID, A.BOARD_NM, A.BOARD_DESC, A.BOARD_TYPE, A.LIST_LEVEL, A.READ_LEVEL, A.WRITE_LEVEL, A.COMMENT_LEVEL, A.UPLOAD_LEVEL, A.EDITOR_LEVEL, A.USE_YN, IFNULL(C.USER_NICKNM,'탈퇴된 관리자') AS CREATE_NICKNM, A.CREATE_IDX, A.CREATE_DATE, IF( A.UPDATE_IDX IS NULL , NULL, IFNULL(D.USER_NICKNM,'탈퇴된 관리자')) AS UPDATE_NICKNM, A.UPDATE_IDX, A.UPDATE_DATE, IFNULL(B.CNT,'0') AS CNT FROM board_master A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(A.IDX) AS CNT, MASTER_IDX FROM board A LEFT JOIN board_master B ON A.MASTER_IDX = B.IDX WHERE A.MASTER_IDX = B.IDX GROUP BY MASTER_IDX ) B ON A.IDX = B.MASTER_IDX LEFT JOIN users C ON A.CREATE_IDX = C.IDX LEFT JOIN users D ON A.UPDATE_IDX = D.IDX WHERE A.IDX = #{idx}

SELECT A.IDX, A.CONTENT_ID, A.CONTENT_NM, A.CONTENT_HTML, A.HIT, A.READ_LEVEL, D.CODE_NM AS READ_LEVEL_CODE_NM, A.CREATE_IDX, A.CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATE_IDX, A.UPDATE_DATE, IFNULL(B.USER_NICKNM,'탈퇴된 관리자') AS CREATE_NICKNM, IF( A.UPDATE_IDX IS NULL , NULL, IFNULL(C.USER_NICKNM,'탈퇴된 관리자')) AS UPDATE_NICKNM FROM content A LEFT JOIN users B ON A.CREATE_IDX = B.IDX LEFT JOIN users C ON A.UPDATE_IDX = C.IDX LEFT JOIN code D ON A.READ_LEVEL = D.CODE AND D.CODE_GROUP_ID = 'LEVEL_CODE' WHERE 1=1
SELECT IDX, CONTENT_ID, CONTENT_NM, CONTENT_HTML, HIT, READ_LEVEL, CREATE_IDX, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_IDX, UPDATE_DATE FROM CONTENT WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO content ( CONTENT_ID, CONTENT_NM, CONTENT_HTML, READ_LEVEL, CREATE_IDX, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{contentId}, #{contentNm}, #{contentHtml}, #{readLevel}, #{userIdx}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE content SET CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}, CONTENT_NM = #{contentNm}, CONTENT_HTML = #{contentHtml}, READ_LEVEL = #{readLevel}, UPDATE_IDX= #{userIdx}, UPDATE_DATE= SYSDATE() WHERE IDX= #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX, QA_SUBJECT, QA_CONTENT, ATTACH_FILE_IDX, IF( A.CREATE_IDX IS NULL , NULL, IFNULL(B.USER_NICKNM,'탈퇴된 사용자')) AS CREATE_NICKNM, A.CREATE_DATE, C.USER_NICKNM AS UPDATE_NICKNM, B.UPDATE_DATE FROM qna A LEFT OUTER JOIN users B on A.CREATE_IDX = B.IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN users C on B.UPDATE_IDX = C.IDX WHERE A.IDX = #{idx} OR A.PARENT_IDX = #{idx} ORDER BY A.IDX
